languages.text: Возле шаттла находятся контейнеры из-под бомб и трупы в характерной броне. Корабль принадлежит {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}. Судя по сохранившимся записям, именно законники заложили взрывчатку и обрушили туннели на головы их обитателям.

Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The voidcraft belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Surviving records suggest it was the Arbitrators who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.
languages.original_text: Возле шаттла находятся контейнеры из-под бомб и трупы в характерной броне. Корабль принадлежит {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Адептус Арбитес{/g}. Судя по сохранившимся записям, именно законники заложили взрывчатку и обрушили туннели на головы их обитателям.

traits.locale_text: Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The ship belongs to the Adeptus Arbites. Surviving records suggest it was the lawmen who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The ship belongs to the Adeptus Arbites. Surviving records suggest it was the lawmen who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The ship belonged to the Adeptus Arbites. Surviving records suggest it was the lawmen who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The ship belonged to the Adeptus Arbites. Surviving records suggest it was the lawmen who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The voidcraft belonged to the Adeptus Arbites. Surviving records suggest it was the Arbitrators who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The voidcraft belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Surviving records suggest it was the Arbitrators who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

languages.text: Neben dem Shuttle liegen leere Bombenhülsen und Leichen in einer charakteristischen Panzerung. Das Raumschiff gehörte dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Einigen Aufzeichnungen zufolge waren es die Arbitratoren, die den Sprengstoff platziert und die Tunnel über ihren Bewohnern zum Einsturz gebracht hatten.
languages.original_text: Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The voidcraft belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Surviving records suggest it was the Arbitrators who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

traits.locale_text: Neben dem Shuttle liegen leere Bombenhülsen und Leichen in einer charakteristischen Panzerung. Das Raumschiff gehörte dem Adeptus Arbites. Einigen Aufzeichnungen zufolge waren es die Arbitratoren, die den Sprengstoff platziert und die Tunnel über ihren Bewohnern zum Einsturz gebracht hatten.

languages.text: À côté de la navette se trouvent des conteneurs vides qui servaient à transporter des bombes, ainsi que des cadavres portant une armure caractéristique. L'appareil appartenait à l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Les documents toujours lisibles suggèrent que ce sont les arbitrators qui ont placé les explosifs pour ensevelir les occupants des tunnels.
languages.original_text: Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The voidcraft belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Surviving records suggest it was the Arbitrators who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

traits.locale_text: À côté de la navette se trouvent des conteneurs vides qui servaient à transporter des bombes, ainsi que des cadavres portant une armure caractéristique. L'appareil appartenait à l'Adeptus Arbites. Les documents toujours lisibles suggèrent que ce sont les arbitrators qui ont placé les explosifs pour ensevelir les occupants des tunnels.

languages.text: シャトルのそばには、空になった爆弾コンテナと特徴的な装甲をまとった死体が横たわっている。そのヴォイドクラフトは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}高等裁定局{/g}のものだった。現存する記録によれば、爆薬を設置し、トンネルを住人もろとも崩落させたのはアービトレイターたちだったようだ。
languages.original_text: Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The voidcraft belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Surviving records suggest it was the Arbitrators who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

traits.locale_text: シャトルのそばには、空になった爆弾コンテナと特徴的な装甲をまとった死体が横たわっている。そのヴォイドクラフトは高等裁定局のものだった。現存する記録によれば、爆薬を設置し、トンネルを住人もろとも崩落させたのはアービトレイターたちだったようだ。

languages.text: Junto a la lanzadera hay contenedores de explosivos vacíos y unos cadáveres con una armadura inconfundible. La nave del vacío pertenecía al {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g} y, según los registros que quedan, fueron los Arbitrator quienes colocaron las bombas e hicieron que los túneles se hundieran.
languages.original_text: Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The voidcraft belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Surviving records suggest it was the Arbitrators who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

traits.locale_text: Junto a la lanzadera hay contenedores de explosivos vacíos y unos cadáveres con una armadura inconfundible. La nave del vacío pertenecía al Adeptus Arbites y, según los registros que quedan, fueron los Arbitrator quienes colocaron las bombas e hicieron que los túneles se hundieran.

languages.text: 穿梭机旁边摆放着空空如也的炸弹容器，躺着几具身穿特制盔甲的尸体。这艘飞船属于{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}帝国法务部{/g}，现存数据显示，当时是法务官埋下了炸弹，导致整个隧道崩塌，隧道下方的居民也因此遭受了灭顶之灾。
languages.original_text: Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The voidcraft belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Surviving records suggest it was the Arbitrators who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

traits.locale_text: 穿梭机旁边摆放着空空如也的炸弹容器，躺着几具身穿特制盔甲的尸体。这艘飞船属于帝国法务部，现存数据显示，当时是法务官埋下了炸弹，导致整个隧道崩塌，隧道下方的居民也因此遭受了灭顶之灾。

languages.text: Mekiğin hemen yanında boş bomba konteynerleri ve kolayca ayırt edilebilen zırhlara bürünmüş cesetler yatıyor. Bu boşluk gemisi, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites'e{/g} aitmiş. Eline geçen kayıtlara göre patlayıcıları yerleştiren ve tünelleri insanların başlarına yıkanlar da Yargıcılarmış.
languages.original_text: Lying next to the shuttle are empty bomb containers and corpses clad in characteristic armour. The voidcraft belonged to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbitesGlossary}Adeptus Arbites{/g}. Surviving records suggest it was the Arbitrators who planted the explosives and collapsed the tunnels on top of their dwellers.

traits.locale_text: Mekiğin hemen yanında boş bomba konteynerleri ve ilk bakışta ayırt edilebilen zırhlara bürünmüş cesetler yatıyor. Bu boşluk gemisi, Adeptus Arbites'e aitmiş. Eline geçen kayıtlara göre patlayıcıları yerleştiren ve tünelleri içindekilerin başlarına yıkanlar da Yargıcılar imiş.
